participant_1.background:

i drive a big truck.
i am 10 years old.
I love spending time with friends who have kids of their own, because we can relate to each other and enjoy the same activities.
pizza is my favorite.

participant_2.background:
I live with my pug and watch CSI to relax.
it s important for my instagram posts to look like i m having fun.
i want to learn how to fly an airplane.
I like to eat at the diner down the street because it reminds me of my childhood.
i like watching ufc fights.

content.text: I like to play with my pug all the time! What do you like to do with yours?
I like watching CSI and relaxing with him. What is your favorite pizza topping?
I love pineapple on my pizza! It is a little controversial, but I love it. Do you have any pets?
I have a pug. He is the best. I love watching UFC fights.
I have never been to one! I have heard they are pretty intense. I like watching youtube videos of them. What is your favorite kind of cookie?
I like chocolate chip cookies. They are the best! I have a lot of friends who have kids. It is so much fun to hang out with them and play.
I have a lot of friends who have kids too! I love hanging out with them and playing games. I like to go to the diner down the street because it reminds me of my childhood.

That sounds like a lot of fun! I love going to the diner down the street too. It is a great place to relax and have a good meal. I want to learn how to fly an airplane. I think it would be so much fun!
That would be so cool! I would love to be able to fly an airplane. I would love to be able to travel the world.
